text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my day off, I decide to take a walk<n>around the academy.
Suddenly—

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hrng?! You there! Halt! You have a<n>peculiar air about you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Could it be? You're destined to stroll<n>with me this afternoon!
Thanken you,<n>thanken you!
choice_data_list: Actually, there's this, uh... thing I need to do.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat?! Wait a second! Could you<n>at least listen to what I
have to say?!<n>It'll only take a moment!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I have the day off today—no training<n>or classes—so I was
thinking about<n>heading to town to kick back and<n>relax.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The thing is... during my usual<n>morning milk divination, it said
my luck<n>today would be horrendous!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But I didn't want to waste my<n>precious day off, so I came
up with a<n>plan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
To gather up all my luckiest items and<n>stuff them into my
pockets—every last<n>one of them!
choice_data_list: And where do I come into play?
And where do I come into play?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The divination also said that spending<n>time with those who
care for you will<n>improve your luck! So please! Could<n>you
pleeease come with me?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru persistently bugs<n>me to accompany her,
and after finally<n>giving in to her request, we make our<n>way
into town.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
First, we're stopping by the candy<n>shop! We can test your
fortune here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Get a piece of candy that comes with<n>a chance to win a
prize! That'll tell you<n>if you're lucky or not!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I buy a piece of gum, and upon<n>unwrapping it—

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Whoaaa! You won! That means your<n>luck today is fantastic!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'm next! I've got all these<n>charms on me, so surely
I'll be able to<n>undo the misfortune from today's<n>morning
milk divination!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru steels herself,<n>then carefully unwraps
her own piece<n>of gum.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
There's nothing written on mine,<n>which means I'm neither
lucky nor<n>unlucky—so normal luck!
choice_data_list: But you got nothing. Isn't that bad luck?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Get with the times! It's better this<n>way! Anyway, hurry up!
Let's go to<n>the next place!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The general store—my favorite place<n>to look for lucky items!
C'mon, let's<n>get searching!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! I already found something!<n>These are super rare
daruma dolls!<n>Look, they all have both of their eyes<n>drawn
on!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
They're usually drawn on when a<n>wish has come true, so
these ones<n>have already completed their mission!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'll take three, please—one to use, one<n>to save, and one to
give away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We enjoy the rest of our walk going<n>from store to store.
Then...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No better way to wrap things up than<n>with a grateful prayer
to the heavens!<n>Thank you for another<n>misfortune-free
day!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Fortune-telling... Divinations... They<n>really are the best.
They're always<n>there to motivate me—push me<n>forward,
y'know? Well, at least ever<n>since then...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! I started believing in<n>divinations when I was little! I
loved<n>running so much, but...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well... I was really bad at it. At my<n>school sports events, I'd
always want<n>to be class runner, but I didn't have<n>the
courage to speak up—not until I<n>had that dream.

text_block_list.name: Shiraoki
text_block_list.text:
Fukukitaru... Heed my words,<n>Fukukitaru... You are to run in
your<n>school race. You will run, and you will<n>win.

text_block_list.name: Young Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh? Really? But who are you?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's how I first met the great<n>Shiraoki! I followed her
instructions,<n>running in the race—and lo and behold,<n>I won!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ever since then, before I start<n>running, I do some kind of
divination or<n>wish upon one of my lucky items!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
To me, all those things are a trail that<n>leads me to good
fortune. They're my<n>road to victory!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If it weren't for them, I'd never even<n>make it past the
starting gate... I'd be<n>nothing without them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's why I can't give them up—not<n>my lucky items, not
my divinations. I<n>don't want to go back to being<n>nothing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no doubt that<n>Matikanefukukitaru truly values her<n>
divinations and lucky items. They're<n>important to her
because they keep<n>her going.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Reliance is fine up to a point, but it's<n>dangerous to become
completely<n>dependent. I need to do something<n>about this
and help her before it's too<n>late.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh? What are we trying?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Hm... So you want me to try out this<n>claw machine, is that
right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Say no more! Witness the power of<n>my lucky items!
choice_data_list:
I'd like you to remove them from your pockets
first.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Do you hear yourself?! It's<n>impossible for me to win
without them!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I have horrendous luck<n>today! Maybe the claw
machine will<n>break down as soon as I put my<n>money in!
That's how bad my luck is!
choice_data_list: Then we'll call over one of the attendants.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I don't know... You aren't being very<n>reasonable right now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm somehow able to convince<n>Matikanefukukitaru to listen
to my<n>advice and temporarily confiscate her<n>lucky items.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Urk... Now I'm just a walking lump of<n>misfortune...
choice_data_list: All right, let's give it a go.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
There's no way I'm getting a single<n>prize... Not with my
current luck. I'm<n>useless... A sorry, hopeless blob...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's worth a shot... At least my<n>lucky trainer is standing
by my side...<n>You'll do that for me, right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her pleas, I take a step back<n>and create distance
between us. Now<n>alone and itemless, she attempts the<n>
game.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
See? Nothing. But what else would<n>happen? It's not like I
have my lucky<n>items to help me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I'm allowed to try again? Well,<n>okay then... If you say
so...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Matikanefukukitaru plays round after<n>round, until finally—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Flop!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wait... I won?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I did it! I won a prize!
choice_data_list: And all without your lucky items.
And all without your lucky items.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... So what you're saying is... If I<n>don't have my lucky
items with me, all<n>I need to do is make my own luck!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Phew... I feel like a huge weighthas been lifted—literally. It's goodknowing I don't have to carry all thatstuff around with me anymore.
choice_data_list:
Overreliance on your stuff hurts more than it
helps.

Overreliance on your stuff hurts more than it
helps.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yep, I get it now! You're right. I was<n>being too scared for my
own good. I'll<n>try to cut down on my lucky items.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But wow... Today sure was a super<n>lucky day after all! This
is the start of<n>a new chapter for me—I know it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
This prize that I so painstakingly won<n>will serve to
commemorate this<n>wonderful occasion! It will be my<n>
newest lucky item!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Or well... I guess I shouldn't add even<n>more to my collection.
Ehehe... I'll just<n>give this to one of the good kids in the<n>
neighborhood or something.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'll just have to make do with the<n>stuff I've already got! As
long as<n>you're with me, that's more than<n>enough for me!
It wouldn't hurt to do<n>a bit of decluttering after all!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a smile on her face, she gives a<n>satisfied nod.
Hopefully, this change<n>of heart is a step in the right direction.
